New Records: The White Sox lost their 109th game of the season, setting a new team record for defeats
Key Match Events: A collision in the second inning between Miguel Vargas and Andrew Benintendi led to an error and costly runs for the White Sox
Post-Match Reflections: The loss marked the White Sox's 109th defeat, likely impacting their playoff chances
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was decided early and in a reckless manner
